heading: Abattoir of Zir Campfire Chat and More Announced!
content: The Diablo team just on November 30th at 11am (PST). It will cover the special Seasonal Event in greater detail. It will also cover the new Midwinter Blight Holiday Event coming later in December along with quality of life improvements coming next year. For full details, see the official statement below. Our next Campfire Chat begins on and will dive into the pinnacle endgame dungeon, the Abattoir of Zir, and our first limited-time event Midwinter Blight. Join associate director of community Adam Fletcher, game director Joe Shely, and associate game director Joseph Piepiora, as they talk more about the Abattoir of Zir, Midwinter Blight and provide a brief preview of quality-of-life arriving next year. We’ll also hold a Q&A segment at the end of the stream for players to field their questions directly to the team. Visit our official Diablo channels to watch live! Following the Campfire Chat's conclusion, we’ll post another article with a video of the chat so you can still catch up on the details if you miss them. is hard at work updating our Endgame Build Guides as we get ready for the upcoming Abattoir of Zir Seasonal Event! Stay tuned later on in the week when our event guide plus builds become available. With that said, head over to our and select the to stay up to date with our content development to make the most of your Season 2 experience! Written by:
